CustomField.description: Order Product Id Matching rules A) Rule 1: QTY, Itemcode, Start Date B) Rule 2: QTY, Itemcode, Exact Amount C) Rule 3: QTY, Itemcode, Amount with variance of .01 ( or .02 or .03 like that ) – Amount it was matched with. If NS amount was greater, make it a -ve sign like -.01 D) Rule 4: Itemcode, Exact Amount E) Rule 5: Itemcode, Amount with variance of .01 ( or .02 or .03 like that ) – Amount it was matched with. If NS amount was greater, make it a -ve sign like -.01
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A) Rule 1: QTY, Itemcode, Start Date B) Rule 2: QTY, Itemcode, Exact Amount C) Rule 3: QTY, Itemcode, Amount with variance of .01 ( or .02 or .03 like that ) – Amount it was matched with. If NS amount was greater, make it a -ve sign like -.01 D) Rule 4: Itemcode, Exact Amount E) Rule 5: Itemcode, Amount with variance of .01 ( or .02 or .03 like that ) – Amount it was matched with. If NS amount was greater, make it a -ve sign like -.01
CustomField.label: Rule Name
